DOC.brief_title: Etanercept ( Enbrel ) Treat Pain Swelling After Third Molar Extraction
DOC.detailed_description: The propose investigation randomize , double-blind , placebo positive-controlled within-subjects design clinical study evaluate role cytokine tumor necrosis factor ( TNF ) acute inflammation use specific TNF receptor antagonist , etanercept ( Enbrel , Immunex Corporation , Seattle , WA ) . The goal study determine whether inhibition TNF bioactivity attenuate acute inflammation . The anti-inflammatory adverse effect etanercept , recombinant TNF receptor fusion protein , evaluate use model tissue injury , oral surgery model . Briefly , healthy volunteer refer third molar extraction undergo surgical extraction third molar local anesthesia conscious sedation . At completion surgical procedure , microdialysis probe place mucogingival flap previously elevate surgical procedure subject observe pain swell course four hour follow surgery . Tissue biopsy prior follow surgery obtain buccal mucosa . Etanercept control administer parenterally one hour prior surgery . Tissue level pro-inflammatory cytokine , growth factor , inflammatory mediator measure time interval postoperatively . Pain swell assess postoperatively course four hour 48 hour . Demonstration amelioration pain , swell , and/or change level tissue mediator take evidence acute anti-inflammatory effect etanercept . Since fusion protein ( hereafter , TNFR : fc ) specifically bind TNF-alpha prevents interaction cellular receptor , change inflammatory cascade clinical endpoint inflammation may provide insight role TNF-alpha pathophysiology acute inflammation clinical sequela .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Male female volunteer refer extraction third molar willing undergo two surgical appointment extraction unilateral third molar . Between age 16 35 year ( base upon eruption pattern agerelated complication associate surgical extraction third molar ) . In good general health ASA status 1 2 ( healthy subject base upon criterion safe outpatient conscious sedation ) . Willing undergo observation period four hour postoperatively . Willing return 48 hour measurement pain , swell , tissue biopsy . Willing return total four visit beyond screen visit . EXCLUSION CRITERIA Pregnant lactating female . Current mental disorder substance abuse . Allergy aspirin NSAIDs . Chronic use medication confound assessment inflammatory response analgesia ( antihistamine , NSAIDs , steroid , antidepressant ) . Presence chronic debilitate disease ( diabetes , rheumatoid arthritis , liver disease , etc ) . Presence symptomatic tooth suggest infection inflammation . Unusual surgical difficulty encounter surgical procedure .
